Title: Vice President of business technology
Headline: Todd Christy was Appointed as Vice President of business technology at US Airways
What Happened: Tempe; AZ-based US Airways appointed Todd Christy as Vice President of business technology.
About Person: Todd Christy was previously the Managing Director of Applications at USAirways.
About Company: US Airways Group Inc is an airline holding company that operates US Airways; US Airways Express and America West Airlines and is based in Temple; Arizona .
